concept.title: Charging VoLTE new directory assistance calls

section.title: Overview
section.p: NCC supports charging for Directory Assistance (DA) calls, by detecting DA query leg and DA transfer leg and applying different charging accordingly.

section.title: DA query
section.p: When NCC receives VoLTE CCR-I with the following set of Service-Specific-Info AVP under IMS-Information, then it recognizes it as a DA query request and applies the DA query surcharge if configured.
The tariff is applied as per call charging rate configuration.

note.p: The DA query surcharge is applied when the first CCR-U with non-zero call usage or CCR-T with non-zero call usage is received.

section.title: DA transfer
section.p: When NCC receives VoLTE CCR-I with the following set of Service-Specific-Info AVP under IMS-Information, then it recognizes it as a DA transfer request and applies the DA transfer surcharge if configured. The charge is applied per call rate configuration.

note.p: The DA Transfer Surcharge is applied when the first CCR-U or CCR-T is received.
